alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 7:33PM CDT until July 05 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR MITCHELL AND FLOYD COUNTIES... At 732 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lyle to 7 miles west of Osage to 10 miles west of Allison, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters and automated weather observation systems. Winds gusted to 68 mph in Mason City. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Osage around 740 PM CDT. Stacyville around 745 PM CDT. Riceville around 755 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include County Roads A 39 And S 70, Meyer, Toeterville, County Roads B 60 And T 18, Rock Creek, Idlewilde State Park and Otranto. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
